2.2.x.description: Apache HTTP Server mod_php remote code execution vulnerability via filename. This affects 2.2.x versions.
Apache HTTP Server directory traversal vulnerability in mod_alias. Affects 2.2.x versions.

2.4.x.description: Apache HTTP Server mod_auth_digest insufficient authorization in 2.4.x before 2.4.40.
Apache Log4j RCE (Log4Shell) vulnerability. Affects applications using vulnerable Log4j versions (e.g., 2.x to 2.14.1).

7.2p2.description: OpenSSH client roaming feature information leak (client bug).
OpenSSH client roaming feature memory corruption.

1.10.x.description: Nginx range filter vulnerability resulting in information disclosure.

vsftpd 2.3.4.description: vsftpd 2.3.4 backdoor command execution vulnerability. (This is a famous one!)

bind 9.9.x.description: BIND `dnssec-enable` default in 9.9.x allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service.
